posts.post_content:
Nice group of T206 Hindu backs available, including some HOF. Asking prices are attached:

Waddell ... PSA 1 ... $525
McGraw ... SGC 10 (back stamp) ... $475
Clarke ... SGC A (trim) ... $450
Marquard ... SGC 10 ... $450
Wagner ... SGC 10 ... $325
Bowerman ... SGC 10 ... $325
Bell ... SGC 30 ... $375

$2800 for the group, signed, sealed, delivered.

Please PM with any specific questions. Thank you very much.
I almost forgot to mention, I am always into trading.

Bump ... cards still for sale. I will always talk trade. I like:

T206
T205
T204
Cracker Jack
Caramels
Turkey Red
1950's Stars
1933 Goudeys/ Sports Kings (especially the Jim Thorpe)
etc.

Thanks!

i'm baaaaaack :D

If anyone is interested, i am looking for some t206 backs and will listen to trade proposals for any of the above Hindu's. Thanks!

Looking for:

American Beauty (all 3 variations)
Broad Leaf (350 and 460) ... (if anyone has a 460, I can pay cash difference or add other cards)
Cycle (350 and 460)
Drum
El Principe
Hindu (brown and red)
Carolina Brights
Tolstoi
Uzit
Sovereign (460)
Lenox (black and brown) ... (if anyone has brown, I can pay cash difference or add other cards)

Thanks fellas.

Derek
